ComicInfo.Title: Chang's Going to Kill You!; The Vanishing Uncle!; The Ghostly Garage!
ComicInfo.Summary:
Chang's Going to Kill You!: Magicman has to stop the deadly spy Chang, but no one alive has seen his face.
The Vanishing Uncle!: A lab accident turns Marty Collins's girlfriend's uncle invisible and Marty doesn't know how to reverse the process.
The Ghostly Garage!: Will Garner comes upon a service station on a lonely road and watches as an angry employee kills the owner and destroys the garage. Later, he learns that this event happened fifty years earlier, but that the area is still haunted.
ComicInfo.Notes: Tagged with ComicTagger 1.6.0a13.dev122 using info from Grand Comics Database on 2024-06-16 19:10:01. [Issue ID 19867]
ComicInfo.AgeRating: Approved by the Comics Code Authority
